= Test Fixtures from ZipXtract

These test fixtures are from the ZipXtract project.

== Files Included

=== Android Test Cases

* `android_test_cases/assets.zip` - Android asset packaging
* `android_test_cases/apk_structure.zip` - APK-like structure
* `android_test_cases/large_entries.zip` - Large file handling on Android

=== Multipart Archives

* `multipart/split_basic.z01` - First part of split archive
* `multipart/split_basic.z02` - Second part
* `multipart/split_basic.zip` - Final part
* `multipart/spanned.zip` - Spanned archive test

=== Edge Cases

* `edge_cases/zero_length.zip` - Zero-length file entries
* `edge_cases/no_central_dir.zip` - Missing central directory
* `edge_cases/duplicate_names.zip` - Duplicate filenames
* `edge_cases/backward_compat.zip` - Backward compatibility tests

== Usage in Omnizip

ZipXtract test cases ensure Omnizip correctly handles ZIP files
in mobile/Android scenarios and various multi-part archive patterns
commonly encountered in real-world applications.

== Modifications

None. These are standard test archives from the ZipXtract test suite
or created to match ZipXtract test scenarios.
